column2: I want to buy a RTX 2080ti
column5: I want to buy a RTX 2080ti. Any model is fine. Card must be shown working! The RTX 3070's are out at under $700 for comparative performance.. SO I will pay around $400 for a USED RTX 2080ti.

SELLING AS IS FOR PARTS OR TO BE REPAIRED Unfortunately my card stopped working, the motherboard Has the VGA light on and it doesn’t post.
The power And rgb on it works, just some kind of issue posting. I’m guessing it may be have been a short circuit. I’m posting to see if anyone would be interested in buying, I’ve had it for 2 years only used to game lightly and general tasks, nothing serious. Hasn’t been used for mining. I tried to use it after a while and discovered this issue.
This card along with all other gpus have skyrocketed in price recently due to demand so if fixed this could be a decent deal for the right person as I’ve seen this variant selling for 600-800 and even higher on eBay.
Let me know if interested.
